name: notification-compact
title: Notification Compact
oneLiner: A compact item for notification content

apiDoc.name: NotificationItemCompact
apiDoc.description: A compact notification item displaying grouped notification events. Features actor avatars (max 3), action description, timestamp, and content preview in a space-efficient layout. Uses NotificationItem builder pattern with Root, Actors, Action, Timestamp, and Content subcomponents. Includes hover background transition.
